content: Supera il cane, arriva al fiume, si toglie stivali e calzini e affonda i piedi nella sabbia della spiaggia.
translations: eng:She gets past the dog, reaches the river, takes off her boots and socks, and sinks her feet into the sand on the beach
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
